ComicInfo.Summary: Things heat up for the Ma'Shiva Emperor Oris Ogden as revolutionaries within his ranks continue to plot his assassination. Meanwhile, on Earth, Jamie faces new challenges in the wake of recent revelations.
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
ComicInfo.Inker: Karl Altstaetter,Victor Olazaba,J. C. Buelna,Victor Olazaba,J. C. Buelna
ComicInfo.Colorist: Brian Buccellato,J. D. Smith,Jose Campos,Robert Chong,Quantum Color FX,Brian Buccellato,J. D. Smith,Jose Campos,Robert Chong,Quantum Color FX
